Package org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Interface Layout

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLayout, CircleLayout, ForceScanAlgorithm, ForceTransferAlgorithm, FRLayout, GEMLayout, ImprovedPushForceScanAlgorithm, ISOMLayout, KKLayout, RandomLayout, SALayout, TimGALayout, TreeLayout
public interface Layout
This is the interface of a layout algorithm.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getMnemonic()
    Returns the mnemonic of this layout algorithm.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Returns the name of this layout algorithm.
    java.lang.String getToolTip()
    Returns the tooltip text of this layout algorithm.
    void layout​(Graph g, java.awt.Rectangle r, AlgorithmListener l)
    Lay out a specified graph by this layout algorithm.
    void setMnemonic​(int mnemonic)
    Sets the mnemonic of this layout algorithm.
    void setName​(java.lang.String name)
    Sets the name of this layout algorithm.
    void setTooltip​(java.lang.String tooltip)
    Sets the tooltip text of this layout algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this layout algorithm.
      Returns:
      the name of this layout algorithm

    • setName

      void setName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this layout algorithm

    • getToolTip

      java.lang.String getToolTip()
      Returns the tooltip text of this layout algorithm.
      Returns:
      the tooltip text of this layout algorithm

    • setTooltip

      void setTooltip​(java.lang.String tooltip)
      Sets the tooltip text of this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      tooltip - the tooltip text of this layout algorithm

    • getMnemonic

      int getMnemonic()
      Returns the mnemonic of this layout algorithm.
      Returns:
      the mnemonic of this layout algorithm, -1 if there is no mnemonic

    • setMnemonic

      void setMnemonic​(int mnemonic)
      Sets the mnemonic of this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      mnemonic - the mnemonic of this layout algorithm, -1 if there is no mnemonic

    • layout

      void layout​(Graph g, java.awt.Rectangle r, AlgorithmListener l)
      Lay out a specified graph by this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      g - a graph to be laid out
      r - an area available for the graph g
      l - a listener that is interested in the progress of the layout
